column6:
It's New Excalibur vs. the original X-Men!! With the Uncanny X-Men down, can Captain Britain and his team defeat what appears to be a murderous team of Cyclops, Jean Grey, Iceman, Beast, Angel and Charles Xavier?,2006,1
32 PGS./ RATED A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Rick Ketcham | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan
